title: Fifa Congress to discuss Qatar claims
description: The Fifa Congress is due to discuss allegations of corruption over its choice of Qatar to host the 2022 World Cup.
content:
Fifa President Sepp Blatter has hit out at critics of the 2022 World Cup in Qatar, accusing them of racism.

The Fifa Congress is facing allegations of corruption over its choice of Qatar after the British media obtained secret emails, letters and bank transfers allegedly showing corrupt payments to football officials.

The sporting body is meeting to discuss the allegations - just two days before the start of this year's tournament in Brazil.
